properties.areaDesc: Johnson, IN; Monroe, IN; Boone, IN; Morgan, IN; Brown, IN; Owen, IN; Hamilton, IN; Hendricks, IN; Putnam, IN; Marion, IN
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 3:14PM EST until January 11 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has extended the

* Flood Advisory for...
Northern Monroe County in south central Indiana...
Morgan County in central Indiana...
Northwestern Brown County in south central Indiana...
Johnson County in central Indiana...
Hendricks County in central Indiana...
Eastern Owen County in west central Indiana...
Marion County in central Indiana...
Southern Boone County in central Indiana...
Hamilton County in central Indiana...
Eastern Putnam County in west central Indiana...

* Until 400 AM EST Saturday.

* At 313 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated rain continuing to fall
across south central Indiana this afternoon. Much of the area has
seen 1 to 2 inches of rain since Thursday evening...and minor
flooding is ongoing in the advisory area.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Indianapolis, Carmel, Fishers, Noblesville, Greenwood, Lawrence,
Plainfield, Franklin, Brownsburg, Lebanon, Beech Grove, Zionsville,
Martinsville, Speedway, Mooresville, Danville, Southport,
Westfield, Avon and Ellettsville.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Please report flooding to your local law enforcement agency when you
can do so safely.

A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding
of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
